Regulatory and geopolitical risks, particularly in regions like China
Intense competition in the automated test equipment (ATE) market
Labor and automation concerns impacting employment in manufacturing sectors
controversies: Relocation of $1 billion worth of manufacturing from China, incurring substantial costs and operational challenges
Broader concerns about the impact of automation on employment
environmental_issues: Commitment to reducing carbon footprint and improving energy efficiency
social_issues: Impact of automation on employment in manufacturing sectors
governance_issues: Compliance with international trade regulations and geopolitical risks
